description:
Cop Games For Kids Free - Is your little one a big lover of police? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the games found in the Police Games For Kids Free App. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging Police Sounds - Lights and Siren your little policeman can explore...but the Police Games All Free doesn't end there.

The activity app also comes with a Fun Police Match Game, and a Beautiful, Real Police Puzzle Game.
Designed for 2 years and up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a siren or sound is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of police car, helicopter, siren and electroshock
- 2 Cool Memory games of cool police pictures
- 6 Real, high quality puzzles for 3 difficulty level with helicopter, police cars, police horse and motorcycle
- 1 Fun Camera cover games with officer hat and stars
- Free, Ads support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Another amazingly cool feature to the police games for free makes it even more awesome then just matching- your little cop must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little police games shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing Cop Games For Kids Free also promotes:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Hand eye coordination.
-Early math concepts.
-Police knowledge

This application is under active development, we always welcome your suggestion to improve "police sounds and games" application.
